title: mris_thickness
description: Measures the thickness of the cortical surface.

hemi.title: Hemisphere
hemi.description: The hemisphere to process (e.g., lh or rh).

max_threshold.title: Max Threshold
max_threshold.description: Use a maximum threshold for thickness (default is 5mm).

fill_holes.title: Fill Holes
fill_holes.description: Fill in thickness in holes in the cortex label using fsaverage cortex label.

thickness_from_seg.title: Thickness From Seg
thickness_from_seg.description: Compute thickness from segmentation. Requires the following parameters: surf label, seg.mgz, dmaxmm, ddeltamm, and output.mgz.

vector.title: Vector Flag
vector.description: Compute the thickness using a variationally derived vector field.
